name: Everhood
description:
Here you control a wooden doll character whose arm has been stolen by a blue gnome...
FeaturesMusic based battles
Main story 5-6 hour journey with many twists and turns
Expect the unexpected
Viseral visuals accompanied with magical music
And a great challenge that awaits the bold...
((Game contains imagery that may be harmful to players with photosensitive epilepsy or similar condition))
